title: This Machine Washable Everlane Jumpsuit Is Half Off
text:
1 item in this article Photo: courtesy of the retailer

You may have noticed some posts from our friends at the Strategist on the Cut. They’ll be dropping in every now and again, sharing their expertise on the basics you don’t have time to research and the weird and wonderful things you don’t yet know you need.

We keep our eyes glued to the Everlane Choose What You Pay section like a hawk to her prey, and the latest thing to catch our attention is this short-sleeve jumpsuit. It’s crafted from Everlane’s classic (breathable, wrinkle-resistant, machine washable) Japanese GoWeave fabric and is available in a very autumnal shade of olive. We perused the reviews, and many note how flattering this thing is for all body types. Wear it with some sandals during these last balmy days of September, or with some ankle boots and a jean jacket when the weather gets cooler.
